column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Went here with another couple this weekend.  We had a 7:15 reservation
column2: wasn't too crowded and we were seated quickly.  Server was good
column3: and the items on the menu were well prepared.  The meatloaf cubes were absolutely delicious
column4: and the pulled pork Hushpuppies were ok.  The Bosscat burger
column6: was absolutely fantastic.  Probably the best burger I have ever had in a restaurant.  Wife had the beef short rib
